55355.00	1.23e+41	2.08e+40	3.26e+41	1.26e+41

#KEY
# Lobs = integrate observed fluxes with no BB fit
# L+BB = observed flux + BB fit extrapolation
# See logL-obs_SN2009mw_BgVrRiIz.txt and logL-bb_SN2009mw_BgVrRiIz.txt for simple LC files
# Methodology:
# filters used:BgVrRiIz
# redshift used:0.0143
# extinction used:0.054
# Flux and wavelength converted to rest-frame
# BB fit below 1A suppressed by factor (lamda/1)^0
